Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Wing spar corrosion detected. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Access Panels component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: U - Lapses on the part of User
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 25/06/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer
